i need to know, how do i mount an .img f: .img, as in a raw CDROM image?
you'll need to convert it to an iso with bchunk first
I don't know the whole process, I don't use raw CD images, but you'd have to install bchunk, and run something like bchunk foo.img foo.cue foo, and mount foo.iso -t iso9660 /mnt/mountpoint -o loop
